responses: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
Sure, I can help you with that. Do you want to assess your risk of heart disease or predict brain tumor?
Let's assess your risk of heart disease. Please provide me with the necessary information.
Let's detect if you have a brain tumor. Please provide me with an image of your brain.
I'm sorry, I can only assist with medical queries at the moment.

patterns: Please specify the type of chest pain.(0,1,2,3)
What is your resting blood pressure? (90-200)
Please provide your resting blood pressure value. (90-200)
What is your serum cholestoral level?  (120-600)
Please provide your serum cholestoral level value. (120-600)
Is your fasting blood sugar level greater than 120mg/dl?  (Yes/No)
What is your resting electrocardiographic result? (0,2)
Please provide your resting electrocardiographic result value. (0,2)
What is your maximum heart rate achieved? (70-210)
Please provide your maximum heart rate achieved value. (70-210)
Have you experienced angina during exercise? (Yes/No)
Please specify if you experience exercise-induced angina. (Yes/No)
What is your ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest? (0-6.5)
Please provide your ST depression value. (0-6.5)
What is the slope of the peak exercise ST segment? (0-2)
Please provide the slope of the peak exercise ST segment value. (0-2)
How many major vessels (0-3) colored by fluoroscopy do you have?
Please specify the number of major vessels colored by fluoroscopy. (0-3)
What is your thalassemia type? (0 = normal; 1 = fixed defect; 2 = reversable defect)
Please provide your thalassemia type value. (0 = normal; 1 = fixed defect; 2 = reversable defect)
